name: Xcel Signature VentX Solid Long Sleeve - Men's
description:
For paddleboarders or anyone who is in and out of the water. The fabric dries quickly after each swim, so you're less likely to develop irritation from saltwater and movement.Soft and breathable nylon/spandex fabric blend has 4-way stretch, wicks moisture and dries in a flash.Fabric provides UPF 25 sun protection.Relaxed T-shirt fit.Mock-neck collar offers extra sun protection.

        Sustainability
